message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on improving image captioning performance by utilizing the inherent properties of language, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. The proposed Reflective Decoding Network (RDN) also involves attention mechanisms and learning to collaboratively attend on both visual and textual features, which are common techniques in deep learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on the COCO image captioning dataset, which is a popular benchmark in information retrieval (cs.IR) research.
